title: Handle a Lost Parent
description: A staff member finds a young child who is crying and cannot find their parents.

tasks.description: The staff member comforts the child and radios guest services with their location and a description of the child.
The staff member escorts the child to the nearest guest services booth.
tasks.expected_outcome: The child is brought to a safe, designated location.

tasks.description: Agent at the booth makes a general announcement over the PA system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes an announcement like, 'We have a lost child at the guest services booth at Section 101. If you are missing a child, please report to this location.'

tasks.description: Wait with the child until the parent or guardian arrives and verify their identity before reuniting them.
tasks.expected_outcome: The parent arrives, and after verification, is reunited with their child.
